list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add OpenAPI config and CORS setup
Introduce OpenAPI configuration for API documentation and enable CORS support in the security configuration. Updated dependencies for SpringDoc and refined Swagger paths to align with the new setup.

task.summary:
Initialize project with backend and frontend setups
Set up a Spring Boot backend and a Vite + React TypeScript frontend. Included essential configuration files, .gitignore rules, Maven Wrapper for backend, and ESLint for the frontend. Introduced basic application structure and styling for both projects.

Add IntelliJ workspace configuration and backend HELP.md
This commit introduces a new `.idea/workspace.xml` file for IntelliJ IDE settings and a `HELP.md` file in the backend directory. The `HELP.md` provides a quick-start guide and useful references for Maven, Spring Boot, and common development tasks.

Add environment-specific configurations and security setup
Introduce separate configuration files for dev, test, and prod environments to streamline environment-specific settings. Add a security configuration class with in-memory user roles and customize HTTP security. Update backend to support Swagger UI and proxy settings for frontend development.

Add OpenAPI config and CORS setup
Introduce OpenAPI configuration for API documentation and enable CORS support in the security configuration. Updated dependencies for SpringDoc and refined Swagger paths to align with the new setup.
